objective: Verify fee structure for OrderType.DEFAULT vs OrderType.POST_ONLY

order_types_found.OrderType.POST_ONLY: Maker-only order (rejects if would cross spread)
order_types_found.OrderType.LIMIT: DOES NOT EXIST in this SDK

fee_determination.key_principle: Fees determined by EXECUTION METHOD, not OrderType

current_pricing_problem.problem: Creates 1-tick gap away from touch, never fills
current_pricing_problem.result: 100% timeout rate, 100% fallback to IOC (taker execution)

key_questions_answers.2_default_allows_both: YES - OrderType.DEFAULT allows both maker and taker execution depending on price placement
key_questions_answers.3_post_only_maker_only: YES - OrderType.POST_ONLY enforces maker-only (rejects taker execution)

critical_undefined.question: Does OrderType.DEFAULT placed AT touch price (crossing spread) execute as maker (2bps) or taker (5bps)?
critical_undefined.status: PENDING VERIFICATION - NEEDED FROM SDK DOCS OR EMPIRICAL TEST
critical_undefined.impact: Determines whether DEFAULT+BBO strategy provides fee improvement

default_fill_rate_advantage.current_post_only: 0% fill rate (100% timeout due to 1-tick gap pricing)
default_fill_rate_advantage.proposed_default: 100% fill rate (immediate execution by crossing spread)
